snippet: Tenant advocates charge that the heavy caseload in the borough, which handles more than 85,000 housing court cases a year, limits tenants’ access to resources and legal guidance.
lead_paragraph: Tenant advocates charge that the heavy caseload in the borough, which handles more than 85,000 housing court cases a year, limits tenants’ access to resources and legal guidance.

headline.seo: Report Says Bronx Rent Disputes Favor Landlords
headline.main: Report Says Bronx Rent Disputes Favor Landlords
